FuncDef: The display tpm status command displays trusted platform module (TPM) details.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays TPM details about the specified board.
-

Displays TPM details about all boards.
-

Examples: SlotID    TPM version  TPM manufacturer  TPM status
Info: The board in slot 1 does not support TPM.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check TPM details about a device, run the display tpm status command. The details include slot IDs, TPM versions, TPM manufacturers, and TPM status.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
